Class CallReceiver

java.lang.Object

      com.DizWARE.ShuffleTone.Receivers.CallReceiver

public class CallReceiver
extends BroadcastReceiver

Receives all phone states(incoming, off-hook, idle) Uses the call manager to do all the internal work.
